sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { add } from 'date-fns' import './ticket.scss'; export default function Ticket({props}) { const { price, carrier, segments } = props; // склонение пересадок const timeOnWay = (mins) => { const m = mins % 60; const h = (mins - m) / 60; return `${h}ч ${m}м` } const arriveTime = () => { const time = add(Date(segments[0].date), {minutes: segments[0].duration}) console.log(time) } return (
{`${price} P`}
{`${segments[0].origin} - ${segments[0].destination}`} {arriveTime}
В ПУТИ {timeOnWay(segments[0].duration)}
{`${segments[0].stops.length} пересадки`} {`${segments[0].stops}`}
{`${segments[1].origin} - ${segments[1].destination}`} 10:45 - 08:00
В ПУТИ {timeOnWay(segments[1].duration)}
{`${segments[1].stops.length} пересадки`} {`${segments[1].stops}`}
); };
